author: bsunanda
body: Add the second version of V19 Flat file for silicon (as of June 30, 2024). This version will be used in the description of the silicon part of the HGCal geometry. It may be the last but one version. There are many updates to the last version - but some more changes may come in the future
title: SiliconV19VX2: Add the second version of V19 Flat file for silicon
